title: GE Over-The-Range Microwave Oven - PVM9005SJSS
description:
GE Over-The-Range Microwave Oven - PVM9005SJSS

Key Features:

2.1 cu. ft. capacity - 1050 Watts (IEC-705 test procedure)

ChefConnect - Three options with a single touch. For instant convenience, choose when to automatically sync clocks and the range burners with the microwave's surface light and vent.

Bottom control with integrated handle - Enjoy a sleek appearance that makes cleaning easy

Upfront charcoal filter with indicator light - Light indicates when odor-removing charcoal filter needs to be replaced

Three-speed, 400-CFM venting system - Removes smoke, steam and odors

10 power levels - Multiple power levels offer cooking flexibility

"Add 30 seconds" button - Add 30 seconds of microwave cooking time
